data.name: Pulse Forge VR v0.544
data.detailed_description: Pulse Forge VR – get the highest score in your favourite music by destroying everything. Forge your own map for music destruction! In this game you can use your favourite musics to create/edit your own fully playable map, where you can destroy boxes to the beat and show that you are best in your favourite music. In the future game is also going to contain its own build in musics with treasures to unlock.
data.about_the_game: Pulse Forge VR – get the highest score in your favourite music by destroying everything. Forge your own map for music destruction! In this game you can use your favourite musics to create/edit your own fully playable map, where you can destroy boxes to the beat and show that you are best in your favourite music. In the future game is also going to contain its own build in musics with treasures to unlock.
data.short_description: Pulse Forge VR– get the highest score in your favourite music by destroying everything. Forge your own map for music destruction and have fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1st gen or or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2nd gen or or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
